overview: DANCING IN THE DARK explores gay and lesbian lives in Australia through the 20 year history of the Sydney Gay and Lesbian Mardi Gras. Through the eyes of the '78ers', a group who participated in the first Mardi Gras, DANCING IN THE DARK reveals very personal yet fascinating stories as well as the '78ers' experience during the first, now historic, Mardi Gras.
title: Dancing In The Dark
